# Operations

A simple Python library for basic mathematical operations and statistics.

## Features
- `csq(a, b,c)` → returns the two values of x
- `circle(r)` → returns the area of a square when given radius
- `length(string)` → returns the length of a string
- `reverse(string)` → returns the reverse of a string and value

## Installation
You can install the package from PyPI (after publishing):
```bash
pip install bendev_tools
